item.name: Strategy
OAuth
Create Local OAuth2 Strategy with ClientID
Create Local OAuth2 Strategy with Credentials

item.description:
Explanation:
OAuth Strategy contains two types of Auth Servers. They are local and oauth.


Local Auth Server:
Create local auth server with either client id or generate the credentials.

OAuth Auth Server:
We can create oauth auth server with or without HMAC secret.

item.name: JWT
item.description:
Explanation:
The available values for authServerAlias are local and oauth.

Explanation:
With this collection we can do CRUD operations on different types of Strategies like OAuth, JWT and OpenID.
